Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires public hearings prior to the passage of any legislation relating to gun control
Summary: Requires five public hearings to be conducted by the senate and assembly codes committees prior to the passage of any legislation relating to gun control.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to requiring public hearings prior to the passage of any legislation relating to gun control
